allow: Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "import sys; sys.path.insert\(0, ''src''\); from retriever import retrieve; print\(''Import successful''\); retrieve.main\(\)")
Bash(cmd /c ".venv\\Scripts\\python.exe -c ""import sys; sys.path.insert\(0, ''src''\); from retriever import retrieve; print\(''Import successful''\)""")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist data\\tpo\\documents \(echo Documents dir exists\) else \(echo Documents dir MISSING\)")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist data\\tpo\\chroma-store \(echo Chroma-store exists\) else \(echo Chroma-store MISSING\)")
Bash(cmd /c ".venv\\Scripts\\python.exe -c ""import sys; print\(''Python version:'', sys.version\); print\(''Path:'', sys.executable\)""")
Bash(powershell -Command "$env:PYTHONPATH=''src''; .\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe -c ''import config; print\(""Config loaded successfully""\); print\(""Port:"", config.MCP_SERVER_PORT\)''")
Bash(powershell -Command "$env:PYTHONPATH=''src''; & ''.\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe'' -c ''import config; print\(""""Config loaded""""\); print\(""""Port:"""", config.MCP_SERVER_PORT\)''")
Bash(../.venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "import config; print\(''Config loaded''\); print\(''Port:'', config.MCP_SERVER_PORT\)")
Bash(cmd /c "for /d /r src %d in \(__pycache__\) do @if exist %d rmdir /s /q %d")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path src -Include __pycache__ -Recurse -Force | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force; Write-Host ''Python cache cleared''")
Bash(cmd /c "tasklist /FI "IMAGENAME eq python.exe" /FO LIST | findstr PID")
